info.name: favorite recipe
info.description:
## Favorite Recipe API

The Favorite Recipe API allows authenticated users to manage their personal collection of favorite recipes. Users can add recipes to their favorites, remove them, and retrieve their favorited recipes with flexible sorting and pagination options.

### Base URL
```
http://localhost:3000/api/v1
```

### Features
- **Add to Favorites**: Save any recipe to your personal favorites list
- **Remove from Favorites**: Remove recipes you no longer want in your favorites
- **Browse Favorites**: Retrieve your favorited recipes with pagination support
- **Flexible Sorting**: Sort favorites by title, view count, prep time, cook time, or creation date

### Authentication
All endpoints require user authentication. Ensure you include valid authentication credentials with each request.

### Common Query Parameters (for GET requests)
| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `page` | integer | Page number for pagination (starts at 1) |
| `limit` | integer | Number of items per page |
| `sortBy` | string | Field to sort by: `title`, `viewCount`, `prepTime`, `cookTime`, `createdAt` |
| `sortOrder` | string | Sort direction: `asc` (ascending) or `desc` (descending) |

### Path Parameters (for POST/DELETE requests)
| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `recipeId` | UUID | The unique identifier of the recipe |

response.name: Error - User Not Authenticated
Success - Recipe Added to Favorites
Error - Recipe Not Found
Error - Recipe Already in Favorites
Success - Favorites Sorted by Cook Time
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "favorites": [
      {
        "id": "e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-ef12-345678901234",
        "title": "Grilled Salmon with Lemon",
        "prepTime": 15,
        "cookTime": 18,
        "viewCount": 1234,
        "createdAt": "2024-01-09T14:00:00.000Z",

      },

      {

  }
}
